# btp_subaccount_role_collection_bases (Data Source)

Lists metadata of all role collections in a subaccount.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "btp_subaccount_role_collection_bases" "all_base_collections" {
  subaccount_id = "1ecb7280-c7d4-4db6-b7da-7af3cdb13505"
}
```
